Summary: Vertical; top sphere like a bright star; lower sphere Big
divs: Sighting DetailsI watched this Vertical Baton move slowly an d silently for 2 hrs; binoculars on lower sphere; looked exactly like a planet, with maplike surface, rotating completely in about 1 second, rotating from right to left. I am a retired police officer.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Norwalk
There were no other sightings in Norwalk on or around November 28th 2008
